titles.title: Expressing support for designation of March 2011 as "National Kidney Cancer and Kidney Health Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 3/11/2011--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of National Kidney Cancer and Kidney Health Awareness Month. Acknowledges the necessity of discovering the causes of and cures for kidney cancer and kidney disease. Urges organizations and health practitioners to promote kidney health awareness and encourage annual health physicals.
